allow: Bash(node -e "const { GoogleGenerativeAI } = require\(''@google/generative-ai''\); const genAI = new GoogleGenerativeAI\(''AIzaSyCRtvWaygyj8PsvqaOZYMANANZynY8aoeI''\); const model = genAI.getGenerativeModel\({ model: ''gemini-pro'' }\); model.generateContent\(''Test''\).then\(result => console.log\(''Success:'', result.response.text\(\)\)\).catch\(err => console.error\(''Error:'', err.message\)\);")
